Summary Note:
The RM was introduced to Gaia Sofia De Luca at a corporate retreat in Rome. They participated in team-building activities and developed a strong rapport, which eventually led to a successful business partnership.
Gaia Sofia De Luca is a 32 year old Private Equity Investor from Italy.
Julius Baer's exceptional client service and bespoke financial solutions were the main reasons she decided to join.
Family Background: Gaia Sofia De Luca and Celli have been married since 2017. Gaia and Celli have 2 children, named Bruno and  Leonardi.
Education Background:
Gaia graduated from Istituto Tecnico Commerciale Statale Luigi Einaudi Torino in 2010.
She then attended University of Naples Federico II, which she graduated in 2016.
Occupation History:
Gaia Sofia De Luca is a 32 year old and comes from Italy.
At Intesa Sanpaolo S.p.A., Gaia Sofia De Luca held the position of Investment Banker from 2017 to 2018, developing essential skills in the field.
She then transitioned to UBM S.p.A. as a Private Equity Investor, leveraging her expertise to drive results from 2019 till now.
Wealth Summary:
While working, she saved 40000 EUR, which she used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
She is still learning about investment strategies and market dynamics.
She owns condo in Modena, where she resides. It is worth 892000 EUR.

In addition to her primary residence, she owns condo in Ancona worth 940000 EUR.

In 2020, she received an inheritance of 2040000 EUR from her late grandfather, who was a prominent Corporate Lawyer, and has since invested it in various assets.
Client Summary: In light of the above, we are optimistic about the client's financial future and career progression and are eager to welcome her as a new client.
